text: Last nights concert in Indianapolis was not a great experience, to be kind! Never in my life have I endeared nothing but “noise” from an artist that seems to be mostly “mellow”. You really need to figure out your sound man, your stage presence, because I have never endured such tremendous bass thumping on my entire body since I attended a Deep Purple concert in 1979. The excessive bass last night was an insult to your band, your back up singers, and fellow musicians. You were at your best when you opened the second set where it was just you, not your band. Honestly, for the excessive amount we paid for tickets (169.00 each) I will never make that mistake again, nor will I recommend anyone see you in concert until you get it right where one can sit down and enjoy your concerts like you can when you listen on you tube. This is easy John, get a good sound man, lessen the bass thump and all will be good! 😀👍
